articles.title: Brazil signs letter of intent to purchase five COVID vaccines - Reuters
articles.description: Brazil's health ministry said on Sunday it will sign non-binding letters of intent to purchase coronavirus vaccines from four companies and Russia's sovereign wealth fund, adding that any purchase will depend on the approval of the nation's regulators.

articles.title: Nov. 22 update on COVID-19 in MN: Deaths and hospital admissions climb; case numbers show signs of dropping - Minnesota Public Radio News
